subject: SSN4974
description_text:
Hi there,

Just wanted to check on my order. It was confirmed on the 17th of December
but there’s no tracking assigned yet.
I know these days are complicated but just to make sure everything is OK.

Thanks for the help!

Miquel

conversations.body_text: Hi Miquel Rodríguez,    Your order has been shipped. We apologize for not updating you in a timely manner.  CE326638751DE
